title: fonts from XLR8R Magazine
content:
Hello,

I’m new to the type id board, and was wondering if anyone knew what fonts these are. Both are from XLR8R Magazine (one is their logo & the other is a font used for headings throughout the magazine). I’ve got a feeling the logo is a custom font, but any help would be much appreciated.

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [xlr8r heading font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929203054/http:/typophile.com/files/xlr8r%20heading%20font.jpg) | 51.14 KB |
| [xlr8r title font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929203054/http:/typophile.com/files/xlr8r%20title%20font.jpg) | 29.92 KB |

 [‹ Clarence House Logo Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929203054/http:/typophile.com/node/49687 "Go to previous forum topic") [Old Font Identification - Please Help ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929203054/http:/typophile.com/node/49648 "Go to next forum topic")
author: merethom

comments.content: The one for the headings is [Bd Mother](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929203054/http:/www.typedifferent.com/2007/goodies/bd_mother_wallpaper.gif) from [Buro Destruct](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929203054/http:/www.typedifferent.com/2007/index.html).
